meaningMnemonic: The <radical>slide</radical> to get off this <radical>jet</radical> is a beautiful, brilliant <kanji>vermilion</kanji> color.
readingMnemonic: You jump onto the <kanji>vermilion</kanji> slide. It's actually more of a steep <reading>chu</reading>te (しゅ). And... oh... urp... it's making you sick.
